reviewText:
This older Discovery series comes from the time when Discovery placed more emphasis on history and education over reality based programming.  Each program is themed toward a historical analysis of weapons used by opposing forces.

I really enjoyed the M16 v.s. AK-47 program.  The program gives a brief overview of the history of the two military rifles, including interviews with AR creator Eugene Stoner and AK-47 creator Mikhail Kalashnikov.  The show also presents a rare interview conducted with both legendary designers together.
